p.s: In the Remarks of president Barack Obama at student roundtable in April seventh 2009 at the Culture and Arts Center of Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University in Tophane (Istanbul), the presidentPresident talked about intercultural understanding and student exchanges.
First the presidentPresident shares, that he wishes to rebuild a relationship between the United States and people of the Muslim world.
He then states, he is proud to see the spirit of activism and responsibility, showing though the young people's passion to the world around them.
After this Obama tells the listeners that simple exchanges can break down the wall between the two groups.
He proceeds to elaborate, that that would be where the process to rebuilding relationships start.
After this he stated that this would only happen, if nobody cooperates and that the people would have to act because the world woudwould be what the people make of it.
